posts.text:
Óska eftir raunhæfu tilboði í þetta.
Nýtt og ónotað. 
1) Case Material: Al-Mg alloy	
2) Input voltage: DC 12V	
3) Output voltage: AC 220V	
4) Rated Power: 2000W	
5) Prolonged use power: 1600W	
6) Output Frequency: 50±2Hz	
7) USB: DC 5V	
8) Overload Protection & Short Circuit Protection 
9) Low Voltage Protection: 9.5V~10.5V / 19V~21V	
10) Over Voltage Protection: 14.5V~15.5V / 29V~31V	
11) Environmental temperature: -5~50 
12) Weight: 3200g 
13) Size: 333*160*75mm

Hvað viltu fá fyrir þetta?
18.000 kr. ?
